name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Revolution
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Revolution
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Revolution is an action-shooter game developed by Treyarch. It was originally released in 2013. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Revolution on PC and PlayStation 3.
